name: Traffic Inspector
description:
Controls: Arrows

Try yourself as an traffic inspector.
Regulate traffic so that all drivers can pass without crashing.
Compete with other players, try to score more points.

You act as a traffic inspector, standing at a crossroads. Cars drive from all directions and their drivers are so stupid that are not going to let anyone through and crash into each other. Your goal is to stop the flow of cars so that other flows can pass freely. Then you earn points and compete with other players.
